I came this morning to the Egyptian Museum and found that some had tried to raid the museum by force last night,'' Zahi Hawass , chairperson of the Supreme Council of Antiquities, said on Saturday. Egyptian citizens tried to prevent them and were joined by the tourism police, but some( looters) managed to enter from above and they destroyed two of the mummies, he said. South Sudan's landmark January 9-15 referendum was also lauded by the 53-member bloc, which pledged its commitment to recognise the results of the poll and to throw its weight behind them. South Sudanese voted overwhelmingly to secede from the north, with complete preliminary results showing that close to 99 percent had opted for secession. coupons statement Thursday, Google's Eric Schmidt , announced that he will hand over the title of chief executive to Google co-founder Larry Page in April. In a message sent out on Twitter, Eric Schmidt said: Day-to-day adult supervision is no longer needed! Eric Schmidt , a tech industry veteran who was brought in 10 years ago to provide what some at the company called`` adult supervision'' for Google's young founders, will take on the role of executive chairman,
